title: How do I change my username?

content:
• I have spelt my username incorrectly
  • I wish to change my username

sections.title: Cause
content: It could be that you have just created an account and realised that your username choice was wrong. Or perhaps, your name or company name has changed meaning that you need to alter it.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Users are not able to change their usernames themselves, however we do allow you to change them through us. You will need to send the following information to the support team:

• E-mail address attached to the account.
  • New Username.
  • Alternate New Username.
You can contact Support here.

sections.title: More Information
content:
• How do I change the e-mail address attached to my account?
  • How do I disable my Unity account?
